DASHBOARD.EMPTY_STATE_DESCRIPTION: Add a location to get started.
DASHBOARD.TITLE: Locations

DASHBOARD_ADD.TITLE: Add Location
DASHBOARD_ADD.DESCRIPTION_1: A location is a place you have traveled or will travel to. It can be a city, country, state or point of interest.
DASHBOARD_ADD.DESCRIPTION_2: You can add specific times you visited this location after adding it.

INDEX.TITLE: Travel Log
INDEX.DESCRIPTION_1: Keep track of your travels and adventures with this simple travel log app.
INDEX.DESCRIPTION_2: Add locations, photos, and notes to create a digital journal of your journeys.
